content_html: A new position has been created to help with recruitment and retention of healthcare workers in Burns Lake. Teri Cutsforth, born and raised in Burns Lake, took up the position of healthcare recruitment coordinator on March 1. She specializes in welcoming and integrating healthcare professionals into the community, assisting with practical concerns such as finding housing and childcare. She also brings a community feel to the position, according to Northern Health, implementing small gestures such as introducing incoming healthcare providers to their new neighbours. The new position was implemented at a time when many locals expressed concern about healthcare staffing levels in the area, particularly due to a physician shortage leading to frequent closures of the emergency department at Lakes District Hospital and Health Centre.
